name: Crimp: The Battle
overview: Crimp: The Battle is a two player only vs shooter for the Commodore 64. It's one of those games where the first person who reaches a set score is the winner. The game was developed by Robert Pätzmann, Hildebrand Mueller, and Ari-Pekka Paljakka and published both into the public domain, but also as part of GO64! 2005/01.
